K10D0105_H0108:444b-1: a'arya mandal aashta dharmma parya ya n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-3: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo //
K10D0105_H0108:444b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-5: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0105_H0108:444b-6: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
K10D0105_H0108:444b-7: ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
K10D0105_H0108:444b-8: / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-18: mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-19: mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
K10D0105_H0108:444b-20: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rgyal po bkod
K10D0105_H0108:444b-21: pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur
K10D0105_H0108:444b-22: te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po
K10D0105_H0108:444b-23: de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-24: de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
K10D0105_H0108:444b-25: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
K10D0105_H0108:444b-26: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
K10D0105_H0108:444b-28: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0105_H0108:445a-1: 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na /
K10D0105_H0108:445a-2: gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das
K10D0105_H0108:445a-3: kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags
K10D0105_H0108:445a-4: so // bcom ldan 'das; bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol /
K10D0105_H0108:445a-5: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na'ang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so //
K10D0105_H0108:445a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
K10D0105_H0108:445a-7: pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang
K10D0105_H0108:445a-8: chub sems dpa' sengge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di
K10D0105_H0108:445a-10: rigs kyi bu; nyon cig dang /
K10D0105_H0108:445a-11: dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes
K10D0105_H0108:445a-12: bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so
K10D0105_H0108:445a-13: so'i skye bo'i dus na kun tu bsten cing bsgoms
K10D0105_H0108:445a-14: te lan mang du byas pa de bstan par bya'o
K10D0105_H0108:445a-16: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
K10D0105_H0108:445a-17: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0105_H0108:445a-18: rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya
K10D0105_H0108:445a-19: ba bzhugs te / 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10D0105_H0108:445a-20: de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin
K10D0105_H0108:445a-21: zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid
K10D0105_H0108:445a-22: du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing /
K10D0105_H0108:445a-23: chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so //
K10D0105_H0108:445a-24: dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya
K10D0105_H0108:445a-25: ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir
K10D0105_H0108:445b-0: yang dang yang du rgyun mi @445b 'chad par khyim
K10D0105_H0108:445b-2: re zhig na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge
K10D0105_H0108:445b-3: slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i
K10D0105_H0108:445b-5: re zhig na khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so //
K10D0105_H0108:445b-6: de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-7: skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-8: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-10: mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-11: phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la
K10D0105_H0108:445b-12: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
K10D0105_H0108:445b-14: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-15: bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o //
K10D0105_H0108:445b-16: des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-17: gang dang gang du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-18: 'khor mang po dang lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-19: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-20: btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-21: lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-22: de la ri dang rtsig pa rnams kyang sgrib par mi byed de /
K10D0105_H0108:445b-23: phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0105_H0108:445b-24: de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rang bar gyur nas /
K10D0105_H0108:446a-1: la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-2: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa ston cig dang /
K10D0105_H0108:446a-3: des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-4: de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas
K10D0105_H0108:446a-5: khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par
K10D0105_H0108:446a-8: nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-9: des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-10: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-11: sems can kun dang thun mong du //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-12: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-13: gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-14: byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-15: rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-16: de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-18: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste; ;'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-19: thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-20: kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-21: gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-22: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-23: sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-24: de bzhin sa yi snying po ste [?]//
K10D0105_H0108:446a-25: de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o //
K10D0105_H0108:446a-28: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te /
K10D0105_H0108:446a-30: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang
K10D0105_H0108:446b-0: ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon @446b
K10D0105_H0108:446b-2: khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig /
K10D0105_H0108:446b-3: kun nas skal pa mthun pa yi //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-6: gang zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-7: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-8: lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-9: blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-10: rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyad bya //
K10D0105_H0108:446b-13: de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba
K10D0105_H0108:446b-14: zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
K10D0105_H0108:446b-15: 'dzin na / de ltar mi blta ste; 'jam dpal
K10D0105_H0108:446b-16: gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na
K10D0105_H0108:446b-17: dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya
K10D0105_H0108:446b-18: 'dzin na / bar gyur to // sengge'i rgyal po bkod pa /
K10D0105_H0108:446b-19: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can
K10D0105_H0108:446b-20: gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin
K10D0105_H0108:446b-21: pa snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis za na /
K10D0105_H0108:446b-23: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can
K10D0105_H0108:446b-24: gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur
K10D0105_H0108:446b-25: to // ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang /
K10D0105_H0108:446b-26: sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye
K10D0105_H0108:446b-27: ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos
K10D0105_H0108:446b-33: nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur ba'i rgyu ni /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-0: @447a *// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-8: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0105_H0108:447a-10: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i chos
K10D0105_H0108:447a-11: kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
K10D0105_H0108:447a-12: //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10D0105_H0108:447a-13: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sde la
